component.name: Perfect Pomodoro Timer
component.summary: A beautiful and customizable Pomodoro timer for productivity

description.p: Perfect Pomodoro Timer is a beautiful desktop application that helps you boost productivity using the proven Pomodoro Technique. With customizable work and break sessions, multiple stunning themes, and seamless system integration, it's the perfect tool for focused work.

ul.li: Customizable work (25min), short break (5min), and long break (15min) durations
Multiple beautiful themes: Default, Forest, Ocean, Sunset, Cherry, Midnight
System tray integration with quick controls
Session history tracking and productivity statistics
Auto-advancing sessions with proper Pomodoro cycle logic
Visual progress tracking with theme-based colors

description.p: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks. This app makes it easy to follow the technique with its intuitive interface and helpful features.

screenshot.caption: Main timer interface with Forest theme
Multiple beautiful themes to choose from

description.p: Initial release of Perfect Pomodoro Timer with all core features:

ul.li: Complete Pomodoro timer implementation with work/break cycles
Six beautiful themes with gradient designs
System tray integration and desktop notifications
